scope.title: Digitalisation summary and games

scope.summary: Quick recap, games and reflections to pull together your digitalisation understanding.
learningObjectives: Explain key digitalisation concepts and use them in plain language.
Apply concepts to short scenarios involving journeys, platforms, and change.
Analyse common failure modes in transformation work and why they happen.
Evaluate what you would do next to improve outcomes and reduce risk.
